com.softstart.VectorImage
Class LineFillVectorImage

java.lang.Object
  com.softstart.VectorImage.VectorImage
      com.softstart.VectorImage.LineFillVectorImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.Icon, java.awt.Paint, java.awt.Shape, java.awt.Stroke, java.awt.Transparency
public class LineFillVectorImage
extends VectorImage

LineFillVectorImage is designed to produce a series of lines, to fill another vector image shape. You can use vertical, horizontal lines, angled lines, or crossed lines. $Id: LineFillVectorImage.java,v 1.2 2006/01/05 19:50:37 tjoneslo Exp $
